modName: Best ENB on the Nexus-With Sharpening
summary: I feel that this is the best looking and most immerse looking enb setting. Realistic colours, Depth of Field and Sharpening.
descriptionHtml:
Well I am lucky I am not good at writing descriptions cause a mod like this doesnt really need one. look at the screenshots :P.

Install it by extracting everything to skyrim folder (where the exe file is)

Go to skyrim.prefs in my documents/games/skyrim and change  bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 to  bFloatPointRenderTarget=1.

And thats it. Then you can enjoy your sexy skyrim. What really does it for me is how realistic the grass/plants look. 

Credits to Boris and his fantastical enb. Couldnt make this without it. 
Mods that make this sexy: Flora Overhaul, HD 2k Skyrim

Sidenote: Sorry if i left something out in the credits or files D: please dont delete the mod just tell me what to add.
author: BronxBomber
